lead_paragraph: After a professor was cleared of sexual misconduct by university personnel, faculty members and students wondered whether the review process had been fair.

headline.print_headline: Fears of ‘Cultural Silence’ at Yale After Professor Is Cleared of Sex Harassment
headline.main: After a Professor Is Cleared of Sexual Harassment, Critics Fear ‘Cultural Silence’ at Yale

snippet: After a professor was cleared of sexual misconduct by university personnel, faculty members and students wondered whether the review process had been fair....
abstract: Yale University clears Prof Thomas Pogge of sexual misconduct charges brought by former student, sparking concerns over longstanding culture of silence around sexual harassment at school; many students, professors, administrators and experts feel university cannot fairly adjudicate such cases, especially when school's reputation is at stake.
